sqlMap.select: /*qaDAO.qaList*/ SELECT INX ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,INSERT_DATE ,ID ,NAME ,ANSWER FROM QA GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(INSERT_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') ORDER BY INSERT_DATE DESC
sqlMap.update: /*qaDAO.qaUpdate*/ UPDATE QA SET TITLE = #TITLE# ,CONTENT = #CONTENT# ,INSERT_DATE = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(),'%Y-%m-%d %h:%i:%s') WHERE INX = #INX#
sqlMap.select: /*qaDAO.qaSelect*/ SELECT INX ,TITLE ,CONTENT ,INSERT_DATE ,ID FROM QA WHERE INX = #INX#
/*qaDAO.answerList*/ SELECT A.ID , A.CONTENT, A.QAINX, A.INX AS ANSWER_INX ,B.INX FROM QA_ANSWER A LEFT JOIN QA B ON A.QAINX = B.INX WHERE B.INX = #INX#
sqlMap.update: /*qaDAO.qaAnswerUpdate*/ UPDATE QA SET ANSWER = 'Y' WHERE INX = #INX#
